videos.title: Bodh Gaya — Guided Overview
videos.description: A short guided overview of Bodh Gaya and its key sites.
body: This video offers a walk through Bodh Gaya, highlighting the Mahabodhi Temple, the Bodhi Tree, and surrounding monasteries.

videos.title: Walking The Pilgrim's Route
videos.description: A travelogue covering the pilgrim route and practical tips.
body: A travelogue that follows a typical pilgrim route, with notes on pacing, accommodation, and respectful visiting.

videos.title: Local Flavors — Food Guide
videos.description: Short guide to local eateries and dishes to try.
body: A quick guide to small family eateries and dhabas where travelers can find nourishing meals after a long day.
